PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-05322007-04-04INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActTelecommunications Act
PrecisORDER VARYING TELECOM DECISION CRTC 2006-15 (Forbearance from the regulation of retail local exchange services) which will allow the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to apply streamlined criteria for forbearance from retail price regulation in local telephone markets and to end restrictions on winbacks and other promotions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0071 Publication Date: 2007-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER VARYING TELECOM DECISION CRTC 2006-15 (Forbearance from the regulation of retail local exchange services) which will allow the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to apply streamlined criteria for forbearance from retail price regulation in local telephone markets and to end restrictions on winbacks and other promotions.
